text: Ini baru pertama kalinya saya nginap di Radisson hotel Medan. Karena menurut saya tempat dan lokasinya sangat strategis karena gak jauh dari pusat kota dan tempat shopping jadi saya pilih tempat ini untuk nginap bersama keluarga saya. Ternyata hotelnya luar biasa bagusnya mulai dari pelayanan yang sangat baik dan fasilitas yang begitu memuaskan yang bisa saya nikmati bersama keluarga. Ada banyak fasilitas yang bisa dinikmati terutama ruang fitnesnya ada berbagai macam alat fitnes yang bisa dinikmati sepuasnya dan di lantai yang sama juga ada swimming pool nya yang lebar banget, air kolamnya bening dan bersih. Apalagi saat malam hari lihat pemandangan kota dengan lampu-lampu gedung di balkon teras 2 Wah pokoknya keren banget. Tapi yang paling nyaman itu kamarnya selain lebar, bersih, rapi, dan wangi dan juga banyak fasilitasnya ada tv, WiFi iluv, tv YouTube, hairdryer, setrika komplit apalagi tempat tidurnya nyaman banget pokoknya kalau udah tidur gak pengen bangun,puas banget. Dan juga in the morning mereka menyajikan breakfast yang enak-enak banget bikin nagih dan pengen makan lagi. Saya respect banget dengan para staffnya karena mereka semua ramah-ramah dan banyak membantu terutama untuk staff HK Rio yang telah membersihkan kamar saya dengan sangat baik. Recommended👍
title: Kamar bersih✨❤️

text:
Lokasi Hotel:
Radisson Medan berada ditengah kota Medan. Lokasi sangat dekat (5 menit) dengan tempat jualan oleh-oleh khas Medan (Bolu Meranti, Medan Napoleon, dll)

Fasilitas Hotel:
Untuk hotel bintang 4 fasilitasnya OKE jadi ga usah diragukan (Swimming Pool, Fitness Centre) terbaik!

Fasilitas Kamar:
Kamar asli luas banget.. Tiap kamar dilengkapi dengan AC, TV, Jam (ini asli KEREN dan UNIK), telepon, meja dan kursi tambahan, setrika, shower dan hair dryer. Saya minta disiapkan sarung dan sejadah pun disediakan Lengkap lah pokoknya! JUARA!

Breakfast:
Not bad, tinggal variasi makanannya aja yah yang harus sering dirubah jadi tamu ga bosen.

Pelayanan Hotel:
Ini yang juara, terima kasih buat resepsionis (Mbak Imelda) yang ngebantu banget kalo ada hal yang saya butuhkan. Good Job!
Oh iya, thank you yah bu Desi untuk bonus tambahannya.. (jangan kapok sama saya).. LOL!
Dan terakhir kebetulan saya check out jam 4 pagi dan dibantu Mas Eko untuk sarapan dan disiapin Taksi.

Sampe ketemu lagi di Medan!
title: Awalnya RAGU , tapi akhirnya PUAS BANGET!

text:
Pada hari sabtu tgl 13 kita check in di hotel raddiso n untuk nginap semalam, dari luar kesan saya hanya ...ah ini mah hotel lama yang direnov doank, tapi setelah saya masuk kedalam, ternyata saya keliru besar, kesan pertama setelah saya masuk kehalaman hotel adalah sambutan yang ramah dari pihak keamanan, staff yang sangat ramah dan ramah serta pelayanan yang cepat pas melakukan cehck in, kita ditawakan untuk menikmati welcome drink (terus ternag kadang hotel bintang 5 sekalipun belum tentu dapat penawaran ini), check in snagat cepat dan tidak bertele2, semua permintaan saya via traveloka diakomodasi sangat baik, saya di pilihkan kamar dilantai 3, dimana lantai tersebut sudah full renovate dan kesan simple modernnya terasa, lift terasa agak kecil dan sempit tetapi terobati dengan pemandangan diluar lift karena liftnya tembus pandang, lorong menuju kaMar lumayan luas, sangat bersih dan terang, kamar kondisinya sangat baru dan bersih, wangi serta fasilitas masih dalam keadaan baik dan lengkap, kamar termasuk ukuran standard tidak besar maupun kecil (kita booking type deluxe), tempat tidur nyaman dan tidak keras, kamar mandi juga sangat bagus dan bersih, sabun cairnya dan shampoonya sangat wangi, sorenya kita mencoba fasilitas gym dan kolam renang, lagi2 saya sangat terkesan staff dikolam renang sangat hangat, ramah dan cekatan. Karena lumayan ramai diarea kolam dan tidak ada tempat duduk saya meminta tempat duduk tambahan dan disanggupi dengan sangar cepat dan cekatan, kolam renang walau tidak besar dan terkesan lama tapi sangat bersih dan airnya sangat jernih begitu juga dengan gym kondisi barang masih bagus dan sangat bersih, malamnya kita jalan2 disekitaran hotel ternyata disebelah hotel adalah pom bensin kecil dengan mart 24 jam, massa kok tong, kfc dan pizza hut disekitaran hotel sangat dekat dengan pusat perbelanjaan pasar petisah dan mall medan fair dan berastagi, paginya kita sarapan dilt 7, restoran sangat nyaman dan bersih,baik staff, manager dan chef sangat ramah dan cekatan, makanan terus menerus diperiksa dan diisi dengan baik, makanan variasinya tidak banyak apabila dibandingkan dengan hotel sejenis tapi semua makanan sangat enak dan cocok dengan lidah kita orang indonesia, hotel ini cocok sekali untuk rekreasi keluarga dan saya pasti akan merekomendasikannya ke teman dan keluarga saya untuk datang kemari
Sebuah catatan kecil : harga termasuk agak pricey dibandingkan hotel dengan standard yang sama dan ruangan yang kurang luas, untuk sarapan menu pastry bisa ditingkatkan dan lebih banyak variasi lagi karena roti dan lupisnya sangat enak,lift hanya 1 yang aktif sehingga kalau ramai harus 
mengantri, pada malam dihari 1 saya nginap terjadi penurunan arus listrik yang menyebabkan lampu mati hidup sebanyak 3 kali sehingga ac kamar tidak berfungsi dengan baik dan sangat panas, hanya itu catatan kecil dari saya, selebihnya saya sanagt puas, semoga hotel ini terus mempertahankan pelayanannya yang sangat bagus.dengan staff2 yang super ramah..apabila tidak ada catatan2 kecil diatas saya pastinya akan memberikan 5 bintang...salam hangat dari saya dan sukses selalu buat hotel radisson
title: Hotel yang nyaman dengan fasilitas lengkap dan pelayanan yang super ramah dan sangat baik

Jadi aku dah lama penasaran Ama hotel ini, so baru ada waktu nginep tgl 27 kemaren, aku ambil kamar deluxe di lantai 3 kamar no 321..

Dari awal masuk hotel staff hotel ramah banget, semua nyapa.. dan pas masuk kamar aku kaget.. kamarnya lengkap, kamu Gag akan percaya untuk masalah sabun aja ada sabun khusus wajah loo.. terus aku cek lemari.. eeee ada  setrika lengkap Ama mejanya tersusun rapi bgt, terus ada timbangan digital, n well ada jam digital...

Yg takjub kamarnya ini loo kotak kontaknya lumayan banyak, dan ada port USB nya loo.. kapan ada hotel di Medan yg Gag pelit Ama port kotak kontak.

Dan kamu jgn kaget kalo semua staff akan menyapamu dgn lembut dan menanyakan apakah anda sudah sarapan? 

Kolam renang memang masih biasa aja, tapi lumayanlah buat yg bawa anak2 dah lumayan lah.. dan petugas kolam akan memberikan handuk, yg aku agak tersentuh setelah selesai berenang si petugas kolam bawain handuk untuk mengkompress wajah supaya Gag kering... Dan itu Gratisssss... 

Semua kemudahan dan keramahan saya dapatkan disini.. semoga hotel ini terus maju ya....
Next pasti saya nginep lagi lah... Soalnya nyaman....

text:
Saya booking kamar dgn teman saya yg bekerja di radisson, harap2 dapat discount, tetapi tidak juga karena kami byr 550rb semalam yg katanya sudah dikasih discount, itu untuk standard room, padahal saya check di traveloka harganya 552rb, saya bisa dapatkan discount 67rb krn saya sering beli ticket di traveloka,  tapi karena tdk enak ya sudah saya byr sesuai dgn harga yg dikasih. 
Sesampai datang, kamar yg dikasih 630, bau rokok yg luar biasa sepanjang koridor,  kaca2 kotor,  handuk yg dikasih warna tdk putih,  sebagai org yg bekerja di Hotel saya kecewa bgt,  saya tdk akan lakukan itu kepada sesama teman,  toch saya byr. Mereka pun mengupgrade ke deluxe room,  mungkin mereka pikir suatu hal yg luar biasa namanya upgrade,  tetapi kamar mandi jendela tdk sesuai dgn website, kamar 206. 
Lantai sedikit ngeres sampai harus cuci kaki berkali2.

Breakfast memang bnyk pilihan tapi rasa tdk begitu enak

Saya suka tinggal di Hotel dari bintang 3 - 5 diamond tetapi baru kali ini saya kecewa. 

Yg bagus dari Hotel ini staff nya ramah2

text: Saya menginap di radisson untuk pertama kalinya. Melihat review di internet saya memutuskan untuk mencoba menginap disini. Kalau dari luar hotel ini terkesan biasa saja. Awal masuk lobynya cukup menarik, yg paling penting pelayanannya yg ramah dan sangat membantu kami. Pas masuk kamar, sangat kagum kamar yg luas untuk kamar tipe kamar deluxe, kamarnya bersih dan kamar mandinya jg bersih. Lampu kamar cukup terang, dan fasilitas kamar lengkap ada teko elektrik lengkap dengan teh kopi gula, kulkas, alarm, meja setrikaan bahkan ada timbangan. Untuk perintilan kamar mandipun sangat lengkap ada sabun yg buat saya ini sabun hotel dengan aroma dan texture yg enak bgt, shampo, conditioner, lotion, sikat gigi, showercaps, kapas dan cottonbuds, handuk, handuk muka, handuk cuci tangan. Tv dengan ukuran yg besar, saya kagum dengan fasilitas kamar ini. Kekurangannya hanya lantai yg tdk karpet. Menurut saya ini memang desain dr mereka. Untuk makanan cukup banyak pilihan, dan enak. Yg kurang hanya tempt makan yg menurut saya terlalu sempit untuk hotel dengan kamr yg lumayan banyak. Satu lg kekurangan hotel ini yaitu letak kolam renang yg sulit ditemukan karena harus menaiki lift yg berbeda. Overall is awesome.. pengalaman yg luar biasa dan menarik. One day i want to stay in this hotel.

text: Memesan via traveloka untuk 3 malam jenis kamar superior, ketika check in malam pertama kamar nya sperti kandang tikus, bangunan tua, bau pengap, amenitis tdk lengkap, karpet kotor, bed cover kotor, kamar mandi ada kecoa tidak sesuai dgn foto yg ada di traveloka. Besok pagi saya komplen ke pihak traveloka dan menghubungi pihak hotel (resepsionis) untuk ganti kamar dan mereka memberikan kamar baru yg jauh lebih layak dari kamar sebelum nya, ternyata tanpa sepengetahuan saya ternyata kamar saya yg baru 2 malam berikut nya di upgrade menjadi deluxe bukan bangunan baru (karna sedang renovasi under radisson management) , saya mengetahui ketika check out dan uang deposit saya senilai 400 ribu tidak dikembalikan karna untuk biaya upgrade, dan tidak ada penyelesaian dari pihak hotel bahkan ketika saya minta manager "bule" nya (under radisson management) untuk menemui saya, dari pihak hotel hanya mengirim staff lokal, walhasil tidak ada penyelesaian, yg ada pengelaman buruk menginap di hotel ini.

text: Ini adalah hotel lama karena jelas terlihat dari bentuk bangunan dan konsep kamarnya. Tetapi saya melihat sudah mulai ada pembenahan renovasi secara bertahap dari hotel ini begitupun juga nama Asean International Hotel yang berubah nama menjadi Radison Hotel. Ukuran lobby, lorong menuju kamar dan kamarnya sangat luas walau masih terasa bangunan lama dan bau lembab tapi untuk menu breakfastnya terbilang lengkap. Saya yakin kalau hotel ini sudah sepenuhnya direnovasi dengan tampilan yang lebih modern hotel ini menjadi salah satu yang terbaik karena dari sisi lokasi juga terbilang strategis karena dekat kemana2.

Hotel ini saya ingat dulunya salah satu hotel mewah di Medan. Namun saat kunjungan terakhir saya menginap di hotel ini, performa hotel ini jauh menurun. Saya melihat segala fasilitas di kamar yang lengkap, hingga kamar yang luas, namun terlihat sudah usang. Dan terlihat kebersihan kamar tidak terlalu diperhatikan dengan seksama. Misalnya kain gorden yang sangat berdebu, bahkan handuk yang saya dapatkan ada terdapat noda hitam, seperti bekas dipakai tamu yang pernah menggunakannya untuk menyemir sepatu. Pertanyaannya kalau memang staf hotel ini menyadari ada noda hitam di handuk, kenapa masih diberikan ke tamu. Jika tidak terlihat, berarti memang kebersihan tidak terlalu diperhatikan.

Saya sempat menggunakan fasilitas gym dan kolam renang di hotel ini, yang cukup mengobati kekcewaan saya terhadap kamar hotel yang mulai usang tersebut.

text: Letak hotel cukup strategis dekat ke pusat perbelanjaan dan di sekitar hotel ada restaurant yang buka 24 jam. Mau makan duria medan juga tinggal jalan kaki. Masuk ke lobby hotel sudah tercium aroma hotel yang sudah lama atau tua. Sesuai dengan harganya yang tidak begitu mahal. Kamar lumayan besar dengan shower, pengering rambut, pemanas air buat teh/ kopi, dua air mineral ukuran sedang, lemari es kecil dan tv flat ukuran sedang. Jika bisa di renovasi total pasti akan meningkatkan value hotelnya menjadi lebih baik.
title: Hotel Lama

text: Untuk hotel yang sedang direnovasi namun masih ingin tetap buka, dan dengan harga yang ditetapkan seharusnya layanan dan fasilitas masih bisa mengedepankan kebersihan, kenyamanan,dan keramahan. Beberapa hal yang perlu diperhatikan adalah shower toilet di kamar saya di lantai 7 yang bocor selangnya, kunci kamar yang terlalu sensitif jika bersinggungan dengan handphone, penyajian sarapan di executive lounge yang terkesan kurang serius. Infrastruktur hotel sangat bagus dan ramai pengunjung, namun sayang pelayanan kurang maksmimal.

text:
Hotel Asean ini diera tahun 2010 sangatlah bonafit dan bagus.
ditahun 2014 ternyata sangat berbeda.
Tampak depan telah renovasi dan sangatlah bagus layaknya hotel kelas atas, masuk didalamnya ternyata tidak ada renovasi.
Kamar tampak kusam, kamar mandi pun sama dengan keran yang susah putar dan shampoo yang habis.
untuk bed dan ac dalam kategori ok.
kolam renang, airnya kotor dan lucunya fasilitas handuk harus bayar sewa.
Butuh renovasi yang total dan berharap ada perubahan dan perbaikan total.

text: Hotel sudah tua dan kurang terawat. Pertama kali masuk dan mencoba liftnya, tombolnya mulai rusak dan harus ditekan sangat keras, pintunya lift juga kurang responsif menutup. Sarapan kurang variatif dengan rasa yang bisa dikatakan kurang enak. pelayannya sulit dicari, tapi mereka cukup membantu. Hanya saja proses di resepsionisnya sangat lama, terutama saat membayar tagihan. Sepertinya pegawainya kurang tanggap dan cepat dalam melayani pelanggan. text:
Check-in on Wednesday night on 16 May 2018, we chose this hotel based on the strategic location. It just we get the room in the corner, and quite far from the guest lift.
As a four-star hotel, this hotel represents as its own star rated. Room is quite big with twin bed with size 1.2 x 2 m, so comfortable.
Room amenities is complete and hot water in bathroom runs well. Aircon functioned well also. 
Breakfast is good, complete, with various food to offer. But the food in chafing dish taste just so so. 
The service is good, from receptionists until food service staff.
Recommended hotel if you stay in Medan.
title: Good hotel in Medan

text:
The Room considered Big with-I think- a King size double bed enough for me, my wife and our 7 years old daughter.
The gym and swimming pool also available with both pool sizes for adult & kids. Breakfast menu though not that many. But for 4 days staying, they are just enough as the choices are always the same.
Even when the location is not in a prime and center part of the city, since Medan is not that big, it was not many issues with travelling down town especially with go-car & grab availability. You just need to order and wait.
title: Nice Plase to Stay in Medan with A Very Worth Price

text: Booked thru agoda. The room is not what you see in any booking engine. Old, dated furnitures. The bedsheet was brown. Spend ard 600rb per night per room. No swimming pool, no gym, no spa. If they expect you to understand that they are on renovation they should state it in Agoda earlier and not after you have done your transaction.

text:
Located in the heart of the city. 
This hotel currently under renovation. The basement is very dusty. The lobby also you can smell the dust everywhere.
The room is cozy but very old, very quiet... 
They have bathtub but no standing shower in room. Very limited tv channel (mostly locals and just a few international channels) 
The receptionist named Sofi handled me very kindly upon check out. At least they have something to be proud of.

The food is so..so... 
The price is so much suitable with the condition... 

I'm not very impressed but excited to see the development of their renovation project.
title: Not impressed.. But...

owner_response.text:
Dear Aditya F,

Thank you for your review about your recent experience at the Asean International Hotel, your feedback is very much appreciated. And thank you for the positive comment about our staff Sofia which I believe this positive feedback will boost our staff spirit.

However I am disappointed to read that you experienced some challenge during your recent stay including a very dusty basement, dusty lobby and some other challenge in the rooms as impact from the modernization project, this will be reviewed accordingly to ensure that the modernization project giving a very minimum impact, I believe you will appreciated the changes once the modernization project is done.

On behalf of the Asean International team, I hope that you will consider staying with us again when you next return to Medan.

Best Regards,
Veri Susandra
Front Office Manager

We considered although budget but the price is slightly overcharged.

text: This used to be a good 4star hotel in a good business location. But this trip proved to be a let down. My Club room air-condition was faulty and the room was warm and stuffy. Some improvement was made after numerous calls but it just bearable. The water pressure was inconsistent and hot/cold flow was not balanced. So, there were shocks of cold water followed by hot water. The room refrigerator did not work and was finally replaced after two days. A total disappointment and definitely not value for money. How does a hotel slip so badly in its product and service offerings?? Management is certainly asleep at the wheel. What a shame. It used to be one of the premier hotels in Medan.
title: A nice hotel that has gone very much downhill.

text: This was my last hotel in a 4D3N holiday tour Toba - Berastagi - Medan and to a certain extent, the worst experience. Services from the check-in staff was good. I stayed in a room on the 6th floor. The room was big with a modern design but I have a few grouses - some of the light switches didnt work, the lighting was poor, the toilet was big but there was some leaking from the pipes, the carpet in the room felt worn out with a musty smell and some of the wallpaper started to peel off. The worst for me is the buffet breakfast. We went to a cafe on the 7th floor for breakfast, because they were accommodating a big group of guests in the hotel restaurant. The food was really suboptimal with over-fried chicken (some tasted like it was spoiled), bland and tasteless fried rice, over-oiled fried noodles, bland porridge, even the milk and orange juice did not tasted right. This is the worst hotel breakfast I have ever experienced.
title: There stars for poor breakfast, average service and rooms

text: We stayed at the Radisson Medan over Christmas with my mobility-challenged mother. The lobby valets headed by Dhani helped her on the steps daily and hauling her in & out of her wheelchair. :) The reception staff also obliged us by putting a chair in the shower for her. Lidya, Yuliana, & Julius helped us plan daily trips, booked us spa visits and even assisted with money-changing - thank you, Julius ! The rooms were very comfortable, large & offered a broad range of international channels. Pretty glass water bottles put in daily. Tiny peeve, housekeeping was not consistent with replenishing toiletries e.g showercaps, but one call to reception solved the problem. Breakfast needs improving, the spread was rather basic. Otherwise, the hotel is in a very central location, near the new Podo Moro Mall & JW Marriot. Most of all, it was the staff who made our visit special :) We had a great stay and rate the Radisson one of Medan's best.
title: All Heart @ The Radisson Medan

text:
My daughter and I stayed in Radisson Medan for three weeks during November - December 2022. We were in the midst of relocating from Sydney, Australia, to Singapore; we stayed in Medan to visit our relatives and to wait for the outcome of my daughter's student visa. 

The staff at Radisson Medan work hard to make us feel at home. From the driver who picked us up from the airport (Yusuf), to the reception team whom I had communicated earlier through emails (Dessi, Lidya, Nurul), and the F&B team, many of whom I got to know more personally because my daughter and I ordered room service or ate at the 7R Restaurant almost every day during our stay.

A special shout-out for Radisson Medan's F&B team, captained by Yesaya. My daughter can't eat anything hot or spicy, and the team work together to communicate and remember our dietary preferences. I remember many of the F&B team members by name: Prengky, Ciovella, Della, Sitra, Erwan, Febry, Chef Carlo, and Chef Agus.  

Relocating involves paperwork, and the reception team (Yuli, Anisah, Eko) strive to the occasion by helping with printing and scanning our documents, thereby making the process easier and less stressful for me.

The live piano performances every Friday and Saturday afternoon were unexpected, lovely surprises during our stay. I made sure to clear my schedule as much as possible to go down to the lobby and listen to the pianists.

Many staff (with or without name tags) greeted us during our ins and outs at the hotel. One I remember is Julius. I apologize if I leave out any staff names in this review, but it's certainly not an indication of poor work on your part.

Overall, I think the team at Radisson Medan are exceptional, and that is an indication of good leadership from Mr. Croise.
title: Home Away From Home -- For Three Weeks

text:
Our stay in the hotel was a really positive experience. All the staff at reception ,  the main entrance,  the restaurant and cleaning were extremely polite and very helpful. The hotel itself was very well positioned to access the nearby malls, markets and  tourist attractions. it was also very clean , modern and the breakfasts every day had lots of choice,  very varied and  very tasty.  2 out of 4 of my family are vegetarian, and we had plenty to choose from.

Although  we did not get their names unfortunately,  the daily cleaning staff were , quick efficient and did a great job in cleaning our rooms.

The receptionists were so helpful especially  Yuliana and  Anisa. They helped us so much with everything, and nothing seemed a problem for them. They were courteous and always made us feel very welcomed. 

Julius, Fauzi and Dhani were always so helpful with taxis , luggage ,directions and were always polite and very welcoming  as we left and entered every day while staying at the hotel.

In the restaurant , Dika , Eko and Febry were always very attentive, and made sure our dining experience was always a positive one.

I would highly recommend this hotel for your stay in Medan, its central to a lot of where you need to visit. Everyone knew Radisson Medan when we were out , so it was easy to get back to on foot, taxi or tuk tuk.

If were travel to Medan again we would definitely , without hesitation book the Radisson Medan again.
title: A great hotel to stay in Medan

Hotel located at decent area, with food surrounding the area.

Pros:
1. Great housekeeping and front desk team

4. Newly renovated is decently furnished for the price

Cons:
1. Shower pressure is extremely weak, and they can't increase it, no matter how you adjust it and even getting engineering to look into it.

2. Facilities is not renovated, i.e swimming pool area.

3. Other guest is a nightmare (part 1) they smoke at the swimming pool area, then proceed to throw cigarette butts and spit into the swimming pool. Treating it like their waste pool. Secondly guest is wearing their full clothing and jump into the swimming pool. What a joke..

4. Other guest (part 2) inconsiderate guest who is extremely noisy, and kept moving furniture thru out the night 4am and morning 8am, not to mention, they smoke in the non smoking room and the smell gets thru my room, due to shared ventilation. 1mil rupiah fine is too little!!

Some suggestions, have a exit direct to swimming pool, instead of going thru smoking room at level 2.

Perhaps put non Indonesian couple on the same floor, instead of mixing them with other unruly guest.

Have a guard to control people in swimming pool to ensure pool rules is enforced, knowing Indonesian guest have 0 education on following rules.

text:
Stay for 4D3N.
Room no 313
5-8 August 2022 

Booking for superior room at high floor.informed by FD during c/in the room i book currently under renovation,So they give an upgrade to Deluxe room locate at 3rd floor. 

First 2 days,Breakfast serve at level 1 ballroom due restaurant at level 7 is under renovation. 

Cons:
-The Hot n Cold water tab at shower and sink is problem.sometime its very hot suddenly temperature drop and its very worst when u open the cold water then during shower its suddenly change to hot water.(maintenance need to look on this)
-The Air conditioner not very cold and temperature change suddenly.its Centralised AC sytem,the control panel located at entrance.
-The limit of the temperature is 25° but i dont think its 25° either.during at night,the temperature change and our sleep is disturb coz sweating at night.
-Medan located in SEA country,so the temperature is hot and the AC is important thing to provide n maintaining.
-The lift is not functioning properly,choose this hotel due to the security and card tap acces to floor but sometimes the lift no need to insert the access card to prees your floor button.Please rectify this item coz security is very important to minimise outside people go to guest floor room freely.
-The buffet spread (at ballroom level 1) need to upgrade the service,food wasnt top up faster.need to inform the staff for top up the finish food.Fruits and butter also need around 15mnt to top up even after informed the staff.(F&B in charge person need to take extra attention on this)
-Toilet at swimming pool its outdated n kind of scary,please change your bulb.its very dark.
-Room 313 TV remote problem,cant press shutdown button.We need remove the plug from socket every night before sleep and put it back in morning. 

Pros:
-Staff, this one is very superb.Staff is polite and welcoming.They really helping and make feel like home.
-Thank you to FD staff who serve me at c/in on 5/8/22.(forgot the name).She give me the room early after room ready.reach at 1130am and only wait around 20mnt before get the room.
-The Housekeeping team,this team very good and helpfull.They always makeup room everyday when we go outside to town.All amenities is top up as per c/in condition.Thank You.we love everytime our room look clean n tidy after come back.
-The FD staff during our C/out miss julianna & Miss Lydia.This 2 lady very good and care.They give us the late c/out at 2pm dueb our flight at 5pm.Thank you miss julliana n miss lydia,really appreciate it...miss julianna come to us and ask about our stay and anything that we need to say or any feedback that can help to improve.She very good,polite and professional person.thump up
-Mr julius,the guy at the concierge is very good and helpfull guys.he always greet everytime we come back.Helpfull and offer help to carry bag and everytime see people who in need,he will offer the help.
-The security,Even the lift is not function properly(like i mention above in cons) but what make me feels safe is this few guys at the front.Know they always there at entrance and checking on every outsider who come in,make me feel safe.They know who is guest who is outsider.
I forgot this guys name,but everyone at security is very good and professional.This kind of security is should have in every hotel,especially 4star n above rating hotel.Good job guys!!!! 

Service: 9/10
Staff : 9.5/10
Facilities : 7/10
Security : 10/10
F&B : 8/10
Room : 7/10
Housekeeping : 9/10
Location : 8/10
title: Good Staff and location,but room and lift need extra attention.

text:
My wife and me have been staying in the Radisson hotel for 44 days (loooong stay) and enjoyed our stay very much. The staff is very helpful and guest-orientated.
Starting with the reception, the restaurant as well as the management, you can feel that they all want the best for their guests.
We had our room on the third floor, which was very nice and modern.
The air condition works well.
The TV offers many different channels, international channels too.
The cleaning staff does a great job.
The breakfast offers a sufficient range of Indonesian dishes and Continental breakfast, egg station, bread, cereals, joghurt, fresh fruits and others.
The hotel offers a fitness area with a good range of machines in good condition.
There are two swimming pools with depths of 0,80 and 1,90 meters, small but nice.
Towels are provided as well as showers, lockers, changing rooms and drinking water.
We had a pleasant stay and are looking forward to coming back to Radisson Medan.
title: Good place to stay in Medan

text:
We stayed there for 8 days at the one bed-room suite, back at around mid November 2021. 
The room was spacious & very clean. My wife & kids loved it & we were so pleased that we then recommend the hotel to our other families visiting Medan,that they also stayed there in the other 3 rooms & all shared the same experience about their stay.

There was an "incident",where somene (hotel's staff) had entered our room to put a fridge  without our knowledge when we were not inside the room,despite that we turned on the "privacy/do not disturb" sign.After submitting our complain the reception desk politely apologized for the incident on behalf of the hotel & promised to findout and later update us about it.

Some staffs at the reception seems giving mediocre service,but Kudoz & Hands-down to the other staffs, notable to mention,they are:
* Ms Imelda and Mr Fuad at the reception, 
for the very warm smile & greeting us everytime we passed by,very flawless reservation process,communication & proactiveness on updating things we asked for a help,taking our complain on the "incident" with post event update later on.
* Ms Ira Pardede at the breakfast restaurant,
for her proactiveness on ensuring everything's fine with our breakfast.
* The security team at the lobby,
that welcoming guess warmly as well. 

Finally, the overall experience we had was execellent & we highly recommend this hotel for those looking to stay at a hotel with very comfortable & clean room located at the city center of Medan.
title: Better than it looks in the photo

text:
Used to be Asean Hotel, it's just renovated last year if I'm not mistaken

When i entered the hotel, it smells very nice and calming. Looks very clean too at the lobby. Easy when checked in, i checked in around 11am.

Hotel room is very clean. Amenities they just provide for 1 person, so need to ask for more. No toothbrushes, haircaps, need to request separately.

I don't really like the bathroom design because the water can easily flood the room if the bathroom clogged since there's no door at shower cubicle

Shampoo and bath gel don't have any brand like the reviews I read before. But still it smells very nice.

Check out a little bit too long since they have to check everything in the room. I checked out at dawn around 4am,ask for the trolley at the designated time, but no one sent the trolley, maybe because it's too early.

Near delipark mall. Read my review about this mall.

Near lots of culinary too, Agu sio bak pui, soto sinar pagi,durian at night

Near clinic Assyifa for swab antigen 

Didn't try breakfast because I want try local foods nearby. 

Better check if there's any promo from the hotel, sometimes it's cheaper. 

So far im pleased to stay at the hotel. Will come back again next time.
title: Worth it

text:
I booked a "suite" room at this hotel expecting this to be a standard Radisson experience. 
The check in staff were very polite and welcoming. I was sent to a room on the 7th floor. The bad stains on the corridor carpets and dated look should have warned me and I went in to my "suite" which was in such a poor state of repair, it was more like a 2 star airport lodging. Amenities missing from the living room bathroom, Towels missing, curtains that would not close due to being stuck on rusty rails, no desk lamp, no beside lamps and an general air of disrepair. The living room was so dark dingy and boring it was not a welcoming feel at all. No cushions on the start plastic sofa, no plants, no decor - cold and miserable.
Add to this the lights fixed around the windows which you could not switch off and i was back to the reception to complain.
To demonstrate the problems a young front desk employee by the name of Dimitri came and we did a tour of room 720. He agreed that things were not as they should be.
I was then offered a change of room to a newly renovated one on the 3rd floor
This was completely different. Modern, clean, well lit and fully equipped and looking more like you expect a Radisson to be.
As the first guest to frequent the room, there were a couple of teething issues - TV not connected in the bedroom, fridge not connected to the power, wardrobe door not on the slider properly - and one would think that a room should be fully commissioned before going on sale but perhaps I was put there before it had had a final check so I can overlook it. 
I don't know who is responsible for interior decor at Radisson Indonesia but they need to pop down to IKEA for some inspiration. The living room whilst clean and OK was still boring. A couple of cushions on the sofa, a pot with some dried grasses or a plant in the corner of the room and maybe a plate of nice fruit on the coffee table (it IS a suite after all) would cost little and transform the first impression.
So - advice . If checking in here, ask for the renovated floors, If in doubt - ask to see the room. If Dimitri is on duty, he'll know! Top employee.
title: Pick the right room and it's a Radisson, pick the wrong one, and it isn't!

Nova at the pool and gym was also such a pleasure to meet and very accommodating, highly professional. It’s obvious the staff is very well trained and well educated, I would love to stay here again!

text:
Good hotel in the centre of Medan. We stayed 2 nights while attending a wedding. Room was clean and comfortable. Very high quality service by all the staff. Complimentary water/tea/biscuits in the reception lobby. Decent outdoor pool, fitness centre with arguably dated equipment. Highlight for us was the breakfast! Very high attention to detail and all staff making sure that guests requests are seen to ASAP. On the day of our early morning departure, we were given a pre-packed cooked breakfast to take on our transfer to the airport (pictured).
The hotel itself is undergoing renovations, so it still had some ongoing building works on some floors. This did not affect us directly.
title: Great customer service

text:
The Radisson is new this year and still building its profile. The rooms are new, bright and pleasant. The beds and excellent and the bedding quite lovely. The Air Conditioning is good, but a bit noisy. The shower is excellent, environmentally friendly because the water is not boiling hot. The bathroom facilities include Rituals products and a weigh scale. The kitchen is a treat because they do not use MSG in the food!!! The breakfast healthy options are a real pleasure including yogourt and muesli, banana smoothie and others.
The only real drawback is the smell of cigarette smoke, not in my non-smoking room, but elsewhere in the hotel. It was particularly bothersome in the dining room. The smoking area is not well-ventilated and everytime the door to it is opened, the smell of smoke engulfs the whole diningroom. This needs to be fixed.
title: Good selection

text:
You will be amazed with the size of the room even for the most standard room. The old room is furnished with carpet (my favorite), the refurbished room using wooden parket floor. And I choose the carpet room.
The lobby is spacious and cozy, no need of card access a little bit made me worry of the security, and something did happen on my third night, when there were noise disturbance at 3 o'clock in the morning comes from the gangway. And the security didn't notice it until some person I persume did make a call to the hotel security.

Anyway, the breakfast floor is nice, we can view Plaza Medan Fair from that floor, thay also prepared a smoking room for those smokers. 
The access is very easy since its located in the middle of the city. I found a nice 'mie ayam medan' stall in the back of the hotel. It taste so delicious and hopefully halal .... hehehe... and just across the hotel we can also find RM Sinar pagi that serves soto.....
So close to meranti and pancake Mei-chin for those who loves local culinery....

Overall, this hotel is one of my favorite if I have to visit Medan again.
title: Spacious Room

text:
My wife and me have been staying in the Radisson hotel for 14 days and enjoyed our stay very much. Radisson Medan is still in a phase of soft opening after taking over the management of Asean Hotel, and all the staff is very helpful and guest-orientated.
Starting with the reception with Kharen, Febi, Rifandi and all the others which names I currently do not remember, the restaurant with helpful staff like Melta, Christian, Jupri, Fatma and many others as well as the management, you can feel that they all want the best for their guests.
We had our room on the second floor, which was very nice and modern.
The air condition was a bit confusing at first, but it works well.
The side with kingsize beds (odd room numbers) is located next to a biker place and can be a bit noisy. The single beds (even numbers) are located with view to the swimming pool. 
The TV offers many different channels, international channels too.
The cleaning staff does a great job, among them to name Nurhayati and others.
The breakfast now offers a good range of Indonesian dishes and Continental breakfast, soups, egg station, breads, cereals, fresh fruits and others.
The hotel offers a fitness area with a good range of machines in good condition.
There are two swimming pools with depths of 0,80 and 1,90 meters, small but nice.
Towels are provided as well as showers, lockers, changing rooms and drinking water.
The hotel is still under renovation, not all facilities are finished and available yet (bar, new Restaurant, etc.), but nevertheless we had a pleasant stay and are looking forward to coming back to Radisson Medan.
title: Very pleasant stay with welcome-feeling

text: We stayed in the Radisson Hotel Medan for 1 week in June and enjoyed our stay. We were a group of 3 adults. Initially we thought the double room was a bit small for us (as they were adding an extra bed for the third person) but when we moved to a twin room we had more space. The staff were accommodating when we requested this small change. The hotel has a nice restaurant, pool and gym. Rooms are cleaned daily. We would recommend some sun loungers for the pool area. The breakfast was good and the staff were always friendly and helpful. The hotel is located on a busy road with a service station next door. We could walk easily to Pizza Hut and KFC and some local restaurants and the main shopping malls were only a short taxi ride away.
title: Comfortable, good service

text: Im pretty surprised with the renovation job they had done on the property, stayed here last year and it's a completely different. The exterior have a nice modern look, coffee shop has been renovated and a dedicated smoking room has been provided. I got the room in the 6th floor, and its completely revamped, modern feel with standing shower. I went upstairs to the 7th floor to have a look at the executive floor, I can't believe its a 4 star hotel, it looks 5 star to me. Next time i'm definitely staying in the executive floor. I'm surprised to look at some of the bad reviews, probably they got the old rooms, luckily i got the new room and I have to say its very nice.

text:
As a Medan citizen, sometimes I need some getaway from daily routine. I choose ASEAN because of it's strategic place.
ASEAN was one the first fine hotel in Medan, even now there's a lot of fine hotels in Medan.
Overall, ASEAN is a good hotel, based on it's strategic location and affordable room price. The newly renovated rooms are more spacious than other same class hotel in town. The TV channel is rich, but still more upgrade on entertainment channel, specially movie channel. Room service also good, taste and service. But for development, ASEAN need more variable in western menu.Breakfast was fine, but it's important for the management to add more western breakfast.
Swimming pool is not to big but enough for relaxation, you also can go to the gym if you want. For nightlife, you can go to karaoke room in the basement.
Based on it's strategic location, you can go to variable hotspot near this hotel. There's also lot of restaurant nearby.
For it's strategic location, comfortable room, and hospitality from the staff, I recommend ASEAN for you.
title: You Can Come, You Can Stay

text:
Schönes, ansprechendes Hotel inmitten von Medan. Die Kommunikation mit Lidya von der Rezeption hat problemlos im Vorfeld geklappt und sie hat den Transfer vom und zum Flughafen organisiert. Die Zimmer sind modern ausgestattet, auch das Badezimmer. Abends habe ich gut in der Bar gegessen, es gab ein indonesisches Buffet und eine recht gute Coverband hat live gespielt.
Frühstück wird im 7. Stock mit einem beeindruckenden Blick über Medan serviert. Reichhaltiges Angebot für westliche und einheimische Gäste.
Auch der Transfer zurück zum Flughafen hat super funktioniert, danke hier auch an die übrigen vom Empfang: Yuliana, Erwa und Radho.
Wer nach Medan will, dem kann ich das Hotel nur empfehlen.
title: Sehr herzlich

text: Slechts 12 uur verbleven ivm doorreis. Inchecken verliep soepel. Aangekomen op de kamer vielen een aantal dingen op. Roomservice beschikbaar, wel zat er een mini wormpje in de broccoli, mag niet gebeuren maar goed je kunt moeilijk brocolistronk checken. Te bedenken dat dit het beste hotel was van de stad, was het oke. Voor 40 euro kun je ook niet heel veel verwachten. Voordeel; grabs vanaf het hotel zijn goed beschikbaar voor acceptabele prijs. Kortom, prima voor slapen en weer door, maar ik zou er absoluut voor je lol blijven

text: En notre qualité de co-présidentes et fondatrices d'une association dont l'action se situe à Sumatra, nous avons été invitées au Radisson de Medan par le Directeur général, Sylvain Croise. La chaîne américaine d'hôtels sponsorise des ONG locales et participe également au développement économique régional. Ceci se répercute très favorablement sur le bon déroulement du séjour des clients dans cet hôtel. Un personnel à l'écoute et faisant preuve de professionnalisme. L'hôtel de Medan est en cours de rénovation mais la chambre qui nous a été attribuée était à tout point de vue satisfaisante. Propreté au top (tout est désinfecté), décoration de très bon goût, et équipement complet. A noter que l'hôtel bénéficie d'une belle terrasse et d'une piscine. Le petit dejeuner/buffet au 7eme étage offre un choix varié de plats (plutôt destinés à la clientèle asiatique). Enfin, je trouve que l'hôtel est bien situé près du centre ville. Une expérience inoubliable.
title: Un hôtel où tout est pensé pour le bien être, la sécurité et la santé des clients.

Nous sommes impatients de vous accueillir à nouveau au Radisson Medan.

Cordialement,
Radisson Medan

text:
Wir haben das Hotel nur als Zwischenstop für eine Übernachtung gewählt, bevor es nach einem mehrtägigen Aufenthalt in Bukit Lawang wieder zurück nach Malaysia ging.
Das gesamte Personal war sehr freundlich zu uns. Wir hatten den Eindruck, dass hier nur selten europäische Gäste unterkommen. Das Zimmer war ausreichend groß und modern. Der Poolbereich war sehr ordentlich. Obwohl wir die einzigen Gäste am Pool waren, wurden wir nach kurzer Zeit schon mit Getränken versorgt. Wir hatten Mittags ein paar Sachen in die Hotelreinigung gegeben, die bereits am frühen Abend schon fertig waren und das zu einem günstigen Preis. Das Frühstückbüffet war recht umfangreich. Wir wurden sehr nett bedient. Das Hotel eignet sich super für einen kurzen Aufenthalt, da die Stadt Medan als solches nicht besonders viele Sehenswürdigkeiten zu bieten hat. Aber auch hier, nur nette Menschen.
title: Super freundliches Personal, sehr bemüht.

text:
Жил в отеле 5 дней. Самое интересное, что везде надписи "Radisson" ))). Но до него еще расти и расти.
В целом, конечно, жить можно. Кровать чистая, удобная. Вода горячая есть. Кондиционер работает...
Но, есть моменты:
В ванной сантехника протекает, на потолке желтое пятно. И не в претензию, но никогда раньше не видел стеклянной стены между ванной и комнатой )))
С кондиционером так и не подружился. Какой режим не ставь, какую температуру не выставляй - валит холодный воздух. 
Окно, не понимаю кто ставил? Постоянный шум обеспечен. Ладно днем, но ночью слушать мотоциклы я не рассчитывал.
Завтрак - отдельная тема. Я, конечно, понимаю, что находился в Индонезии.  Но есть какой-то стандартный набор блюд в отелях на завтрак. Тем более, если есть претензия на Radisson. 
Так что в целом, если не заморачиваться, то жить можно. Но, если отель на что-то претендует, то работы еще очень много
title: Рекомендовать не буду
